game.name: Trivia Vault: 1980's Trivia 2
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Answer 1980s category trivia questions as quickly as you can, the faster you answer the higher the cash value. Correct answers lock in the digit code for the vault, 10 correct answers cracks the vault and awards bonus cash. Track your progress and aim for higher scores to accomplish higher ranks.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Answer 1980s category trivia questions as quickly as you can, the faster you answer the higher the cash value. Correct answers lock in the digit code for the vault, 10 correct answers cracks the vault and awards bonus cash. Track your progress and aim for higher scores to accomplish higher ranks.

reviewHighlights.text: 립낫 이 새끼들아, 내가 지금까지 좋게 봐주면서 광고 패러디로 리뷰도 썼는데······ 가격 올린 거 실화냐? 기존 1,100원에서 2,200원 하던 게임들이 모두 10배 가량 정가가 올랐네? 아니, 십알 꼭 이래야만 했어? 예전에 제품을 구매했던 유저들은 상관이 없는...
